commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Update Objective-C snippets
commits.body: These are updated both to use new TextMate features (like multiple choice menus for types) and Objective-C features (like assuming ARC and returning instancetype from initializer).

commits.author: Ronald Wampler
commits.summary: Add new "class" property keyword

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Fix sort/uniq of completion results
commits.body:
The current code was sorting on the filter string, but for methods with multiple arguments, the filter string does not contain the parameter names even though they are part of the display string.

The code to prune duplicates may have worked, but it assumed a sorted list, which was not always the case.

I moved sorting to the show_dialog function and made a (syntactically) simpler uniq function.

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Update completion tables using MacOSX10.11.sdk

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Always place functions in the grammar repository
commits.body:
Currently the C and Objective-C grammars expect the functions to be in the repository for the C platform functions but not the Objective-C platform functions, this is a little inconsistent, so since having the functions in the repository is the most flexible, this is what we choose.

This commit also include the required change to the Objective-C grammar.

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Add the code used to generate Platform.tmLanguage

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Update symbols using MacOSX10.11.sdk
commits.body: We now include `Platform.md` so that it’s easier to see what changed since last generation (mainly to ensure we are not missing symbols or similar).

commits.author: Jason Wray
commits.summary: Add `nullable` and `nonnull` to property keyword list

commits.author: Ronald Wampler
commits.summary: Allow any amount of whitespace between the receiver and message
commits.body: Also use '\s' to account for other whitespace characters.

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Add syntax highlight for the typedefs in NSObjCRuntime.h
commits.body: This is where NS[U]Integer is defined.

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Support Obj-C placeholders in C strings appended to Obj-C strings

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Use tabs instead of spaces in autorelease <kbd class='tabTrigger'>pool⇥</kbd> snippet

commits.author: Ronald Wampler
commits.summary: Add "atomic" to property keyword list

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Use explicit count modifiers
commits.body:
The `{,N}` extension is not supported by most Regexp engines, as it is
an Onigurma-only extension.

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Completion was missing objc/NSObject.h and objc/runtime.h

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Add methods from Cocoa protocols to our completion index

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Ignore Swift documentation matches for <kbd class='keyEquivalent'>⌃H</kbd>
commits.body: This avoids showing a pop-up menu for most documentation lookups.

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Update completion index (using 10.10 SDK)

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Remove legacy support files for documentation lookups

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Don’t show “Completion: Inside @selector” in the bundle menu
commits.body: This is consistent with the other two completion commands.

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Remove legacy completion command (using dialog 1.x)

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Include ‘source.c.platform#functions’ instead of redeclaring them

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Remove script used to grep Cocoa headers for grammar symbols
commits.body: This is no longer used, instead we used a libclang-based approach.

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Update platform definitions to latest SDK

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Move symbols from the Cocoa SDK to its own Platform grammar file
commits.body: This makes it easier to automatically update the grammar to new SDKs.

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Overload <kbd class='tabTrigger'>for⇥</kbd> (loop) in Objective-C
commits.body: In Objective-C we generally want to use NSUInteger instead of size_t as type for the index variable.
